name: Fire Blast
description: Two pillars of raging hot flames explode out from you and leap towards up to two creature in range. The creature(s) targeted must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC for each pillar, taking 1d8 + MOVE fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by 5 or more become burned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works better the more excited the crowd is.
